document.full_text: egypt's anti-graft agency said on friday it had questioned former president hosni mubarak and his wife in a probe into corruption charges and ordered both detained pending further investigations.
document.title: egypt graft agency rules to detain mubarak, wife
lines_and_colors: egypt's anti-graft agency said on friday it had questioned former president hosni mubarak and his wife in a probe into corruption charges and ordered both detained pending further investigations.
